::Hot Rod::

He manuvered to the side as Lucenite's shots flew by. He watched as
Dragoon high tailed it out of the area. He followed with hsi optics.
When Dragoon stoped, Hot Rod fired two missiles his way.
He then turned to Lucenite, and shot another group of four laser at
him.(Including the ones that missed Dragoon, that makes 8 laser shots.)

OOC: Last post tonight. Talk to you all tomorrow!
